item.title: Deutsche Bank shares gain 9% after second-quarter profit beat

item.title: Estonia's tech elite are getting behind a European challenger to Robinhood
item.description: A host of Estonia's top tech entrepreneurs — including ride-hailing unicorn Bolt's CEO Markus Villig — are investing in European trading app Lightyear...
